content: Great article Joan! It definitely rings true. I’m about 2 years into engineering management… wish I had read this article at the beginning! One addl area where I find myself feeling like a bottleneck is WRT legacy projects. For a few projects which still experience new bugs I’m currently the only one who knows where to start with an investigation and fix. I have shied away from teaching new team members how to contribute to legacy projects (esp since some were inherited and use anti-patterns). Have you run into this dilemma as well?
